data.speaker: Player
data.content: Where am I? Is this... a hospital? Something definitely isn't right... How did I even get here?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Oh God! Lev! Are you okay?

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: Ugh... I don't feel good... What did you do to me, Olivia? Who's Lev?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Oh no, he's completely delirious... Hang in there, I'll find something to help you...
